sentences.en: " Thus, it is evident that gossip has a strong manipulative potential. "
sentences.cn: “ 由此看来, 流言显然具有很强的操纵力. ”

sentences.en: Although strong and decisive the Dragon is not manipulative or sly.
sentences.cn: 虽然强壮和决定性的龙不善于伪装或狡猾.

sentences.en: Automatization is namely that the manufacture machine which automated by electron manipulative.
sentences.cn: 自动化指的就是引进电子控制的自动操作的生产机器.

sentences.en: Before a child can learn a musical instrument he or she first needs to acquire the necessary manipulative skills.
sentences.cn: 儿童先要掌握一些必需的操作技能，然后才能学习演奏一种乐器。

sentences.en: He described Mr Long as cold, calculating and manipulative.
sentences.cn: 他说郎先生是个冷酷、算计，又爱摆布人的人。

sentences.en: He is sharp and manipulative with a strong personality.
sentences.cn: 他个性很强，为人精明且爱指使人。

sentences.en: I try to be thoughtful, but he calls it manipulative.
sentences.cn: 我是一番关心体贴, 但他认为是操纵控制.

sentences.en: manipulative skills such as typing and knitting
sentences.cn: 诸如打字、编织这样的技能

sentences.en: Results Students manipulative ability and experiment skill were improved notably.
sentences.cn: 结果:学生的动手能力和实验技能均有显著提高.

sentences.en: She is devious and sly and manipulative.
Speed and accuracy are the common measures of Manipulative movements.
sentences.cn: 速度和准确性是操纵运动的一种指标.

sentences.en: The worker was promoted despite aggressive and manipulative behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这个工人尽管盛气凌人，工于心计，却受到了提拔。
他们贪得无厌而且喜欢摆布人。

sentences.en: This girl is manipulative and very good at getting what she wants.
sentences.cn: 这种女孩操纵欲很强,而且非常擅于得到她想要的.

sentences.en: Through incompetence, conviction, or over - confidence in his manipulative skills, Allende never faced up to that dilemma.
sentences.cn: 由于阿连德领导无方, 墨守信念, 过分相信自己手腕高明, 因此他从未认真对待这种左右为难的局面.

sentences.en: Under stress these people will appear to be superficial, over-eager and manipulative.
sentences.cn: 这些人在压力下会显得浅薄无知、操之过急，而且爱摆布人。

words.tran_cn: 可操纵自如的；可以操作的
有人驾驶的；有人操纵的；配备齐船员的
给…配备人员（man的过去分词）
操纵；操作；巧妙地处理；篡改

trans.tran_cn: 巧妙处理的，操作的，用手处理的，管理的
trans.tran_en: relating to the ability to handle objects in a skilful way
